instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Bento Grid' layout for the Dashboard.jsx page.
Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings. Add it to index.css via Google Fonts import if missing.
Ensure all cards have the 'hover_lift' motion effect defined in the design system.
For KaizerFit.jsx, use the 'accent_fitness' color (#F97316) for charts and primary buttons.
For AQIReport.jsx, use the 'accent_eco' color (#10B981) and the nature image as a subtle background or header.
For DumpYardInfo.jsx, focus on clarity and information hierarchy using the 'waste_management' image.
Ensure the mobile navigation bar is implemented with the glassmorphism style defined.
Use 'recharts' for all data visualization, styling them to match the minimal aesthetic.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry and whitespace.
Do not use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
Ensure high contrast for text accessibility.
Prioritize Shadcn components but customize them to match the 'Premium Civic Tech' theme.
